content: Hi, I'm trying to book a flight for my friend who's visiting from out of country. Can you help me with that?
Of course! What type of trip is your friend taking? Business or leisure?
Leisure. He's got a week off and wants to explore the city. Can you recommend any good hotels in the area?
Absolutely! There are several great options depending on your budget. What's your friend looking for in a hotel? A specific location or amenities?
I'm not sure yet, but I want to make sure it's convenient for him to get around the city. Can you also recommend any good restaurants or cafes nearby?
